artist: Author: Chris Boarts Larson; Publisher: Slug & Lettuce, Richmond, Va.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Loose, folded leaves with an illustrated title at the top, columns of text, and band photography along the right margin; 20 pp.
medium: Offset lithography, letterpress; loose, folded leaves
title: Slug & Lettuce #86
